catch_copy: Run your own game shop. Buy, sell, and grow your game business.
copyright_text: Copyrights: © 2025 Max Interactive Studio. All rights reserved.
description:
You begin with a small, empty game shop and a limited amount of starting funds. Your objective is to manage daily operations, expand your store, and build a successful retail business. Order stock, organize shelves, assist customers, and grow your reputation as you work toward becoming a top game shop owner.

Features:
• Walk through your shop, order new stock, unpack deliveries, and place items on shelves, display racks, and counters.
• Serve customers promptly to maintain positive feedback and improve your store’s rating.
• Expand your shop by purchasing additional space. Larger stores may increase maintenance and utility costs.
• Unlock new product categories such as consoles, games, accessories, trading cards, and plush items by acquiring licenses from distributors.
• Adjust item prices to balance customer satisfaction with optimized profitability.
• Collect and recycle empty boxes to earn small cash bonuses.
• Compete on the global leaderboard.

How to Play:
1. Order stock using the in-game computer, then unpack and arrange items in your store.
2. Open the shop each day and serve customers as they browse and make purchases.
3. Operate the cashier: scan items, process payments, and keep the checkout line moving.
4. Adjust prices to manage profit margins and customer reactions.
5. Use your earnings to expand the shop, upgrade the interior, and unlock new distributor licenses.
6. Customize your store layout, wall colors, flooring, and shop name.

Note:
You begin with one shelf, a basic computer, and a cash register inside a small shop. Video footage may show mid or late-game progress with additional unlocked content.
disclaimer: This game is suitable for players of all ages. Game has NO references to alcohol, cigarettes, tobacco, or related imagery. All content is appropriate for children and promotes a safe, family-friendly play environment.
